title: Natural Anodizing Electromagnetic Door Handle 12/24V DC + Contact
body:
This is an aluminium door handle incorporating two 600lb holding force of stainless steel electromagnetic locks into it.

The door handle lock comes in 2 pieces whereby the locks are already pre-mounted with wires and connectors on one piece and the armature plates are fitted on the other.

Even the screw holes are pre-drilled for ease of installation.

The length of 2500mm can be specified and adjusted to the length of the doors if requested before delivery.

Tampering of this product is made extremely difficult because the wires, screws and armature plates are concealed by its aluminium covers and end caps.

The design of this product ensures perfect alignment.

This CPREG handle is compatible with any alarm and access control systems.

This handle can be installed only on aluminium and wooden doors.

title: Non Anodized Electromagnetic Door Handle 12/24V DC + Contact
body:
This is an aluminium door handle that can be fitted with 2 stainless steel electromagnetic locks each with 600lb holding force.

The door handle can be powder-coated to the colour of choice and the length can be adapted to the length of the door.

The design of this product ensures perfect alignment and prevents tampering as the wires, screws and armature plates are concealed by aluminium covers and end caps.

It can be incorporated with alarm and access control systems.

This handle can be installed only on aluminium and wooden doors.

title: Natural Anodizing Reinforcement Profile with Handle
body:
This aluminium handle is an accessory for CPREG-1/2500.

It is an added compliment to the whole installation.

This part is fixed to the other side of the door parallel to CPREG-1/2500 on another side.

title: Non-Anodized Reinforcement Profile with Handle
body:
This non-anodized aluminium handle is an accessory for CPREG-1/2500.

It is an added compliment to the whole installation.

This part is fixed to the other side of the door parallel to CPREG-1/2500 on another side.

title: Natural Anodizing Reinforcement Profile
body: This part acts as an optional accessory for CPREG-1/2500 whereby it is fixed to the other side of the door parallel to CPREG-1/2500 on another side.

title: Non-Anodized Reinforcement Profile
body: This part acts as an optional accessory for CPREG-1/2500 whereby it is fixed to the other side of the door parallel to CPREG-1/2500 on another side.
